notes: Spacious, modern apartment in excellent condition with clean white walls, polished tile floors, track lighting, and built-in ceiling AC. The living room is very large with floor-to-ceiling windows providing good natural light and a visible balcony with protective railings. The glass coffee table with sharp metal frame corners is a baby safety concern and would need padding or replacement. Listed through HOYUAN Real Estate Agency (禾源外商租屋管理公司), which caters to foreigners. At 42 ping in Da'an district on 2F of a 12-story building, it likely has an elevator and offers ample space for a growing family, though only living room and one bedroom are shown — kitchen and bathroom photos are missing.
